page.title: 18MY DAY(cont.)
page.content: I come back to get my sandwich box. We go into the hall, sit in our places and say grace, then I eat my sandwiches. When everybody has finished we go out to play. After which Mr Keeling takes the register and says what were going to do in the afternoon. We have drama, R.E,games P.E and art. We usually have a story or a game before we go home. My sister waits for me while I get ready then we both go to my mums car. When I'm home I call for my friends Samantha, Rebecca,Emma, Rachel, Nicola and Anna. When I've played for a while I go in for my tea. Sometimes I go out to play again. Otherwise have a bath . Then I read a book,play a game or watch television. Then I go upstairs and clean my teeth,and at 9o'clock I go to bed.
